name: Crane Riposte

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Crane Style, Crane Wing, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.

sections.body: You take only a Ð1 penalty on attack rolls for fighting defensively. Whenever you use Crane Wing to deflect an opponent's attack, you can make an attack of opportunity against that opponent after the attack is deflected.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You use your defensive abilities to make overpowering counterattacks.
